Html:
Hi,

I just started to use NAudio and i'm trying to convert aif file o mp3.
Can someone help me?

10x,
Lior

Use AiffFileReader to get from AIFF to PCM
Then to make MP3, there are several options, but NAudio.Lame would be a good choice

Hi markheath, 10x for you answer,

I've looked at NAudio.Lame link and this is what i did:
  1. opened a new .net project.
  2. downloaded NAudio.Lame using Nuget.
  3. copied the example code from https://github.com/Corey-M/NAudio.Lame
  4. the convertion between mp3 to wav worked fine but when i've tried to convert between wav to mp3 i got an error:
    Unable to load DLL 'libmp3lame.32.dll': The specified module could not be found. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)
but i can see that i have these files in my solution (the nuget added all the files)

Do you familiar with this?

In addition, who do i use AiffFileReader?

10x,
Lior

for my first question, now it's ok.

this is the answer
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20088743/mvc4-app-unable-to-load-dll-libmp3lame-32-dll

I'd like if you can tell me how to use AiffFileReader...

10x,
Lior
